title: The Seletar Mall Kids Adventure Club Activities
blurb: Tailored for young children aged 4 to 12.
description: The Kids Adventure Club at The Seletar Mall is specially tailored for young children aged 4 to 12 to engage their curious minds. Members can unlock exclusive benefits such as invitations to The Seletar Mall events and birthday surprises. Get started on an exciting journey through time alongside Sir Little and Friends! Learning opportunities are abundant with a diverse array of enrichment centres that cater to interests such as art, music and dance that will enrich your childâ€™s development. Parents can also use the conveniently located Diaper Changing & Nursing Rooms.
datetime_display: Friends! Rooftop Playground Catch the breeze and chill with a scenic view with your little ones at the rooftop playground located on Level 4

title: Rooftop Playground at The Seletar Mall
blurb: Chill with a scenic view at the rooftop playground!
description: The rooftop playground on Level 4 offers a scenic view where kids can meet Sir Little and Friends. Open from 10am to 10pm, weather permitting. When the sun sets, the playground is illuminated by solar lighting, creating a magical ambience for families to enjoy. Diaper changing and nursing rooms are conveniently located at Basement 1, Level 2, Level 3 and Level 4, equipped with basins, hot water dispensers, diaper changing stations and nursing rooms.
